reasoning: Classical Burkitt lymphoma is a specific WHO-defined subtype of Burkitt lymphoma. Global incidence approximately 1-2 per 100k from cancer registry data (GLOBOCAN 2002-2012). Higher prevalence in sub-Saharan Africa due to EBV correlation.
source: Parkin DM et al. (2010). Global cancer statistics. CA Cancer J Clin. 55(2):74-108
